str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To pain, grieve, vex. From lupe; to distress; reflexively or passively, to be sad.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To seal, set a seal upon. From sphragis; to stamp for security or preservation; by implication, to keep secret, to attest.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
From a compound of apo and lutron; ransom in full, i.e. riddance, or Christian salvation.
